FeatureGroupName.markdownDescription:
The Name of the FeatureGroup.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9]){0,63}  
Update requires: Replacement

Required: Yes

Update requires: Replacement

Update requires: Replacement
